sentences.en: A man prays toward a column of Buddhist monks in Rangoon, Burma.
sentences.cn: 缅甸首都仰光, 一名男子正朝着僧侣的队伍祈祷.

sentences.en: Burma artillery battalions use 110 mm and 105 mm heavy mortar.
sentences.cn: 缅甸炮兵营使用110毫米和105毫米重型迫击炮.

sentences.en: Burma Road and Stilwell Road go through the boundary lines.
sentences.cn: 滇缅公路、史迪威公路穿境而过.

sentences.en: Did you know in Burma you get seven years in prison for telling jokes?
sentences.cn: 你知道光讲笑话都可以坐7年牢 吗 ?

sentences.en: For us - for the women of Burma - this award means a lot of us.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说,对缅甸妇女来说,这个奖项意义重大.

sentences.en: Her letters paint a wonderful picture of her life in Burma.
sentences.cn: 她的书信描绘了她在缅甸生活的一幅绝妙图画.

sentences.en: Indian troops bore the brunt of the Burma campaigns.
sentences.cn: 在缅甸战役中,印军首当其冲.

sentences.en: Kyat is a basic unit of currency in Burma.
sentences.cn: 缅元缅元是缅甸的基本货币单位.

sentences.en: Severino says the focus now should be on helping the people of Burma.
sentences.cn: 塞韦里诺说，现在的工作重点应该是帮助缅甸人民。

sentences.en: That has been particularly true when it comes to Burma.
sentences.cn: 当涉及到缅甸问题时,这一点尤其正确.

sentences.en: The directors of the company had issued orders for liquidation of the Burma venture.
sentences.cn: 公司董事会就发出命令,结束在缅甸的冒险.

sentences.en: The Metre Gauge Railway Coaches Made for Burma ( lst part )
sentences.cn: 为缅甸制造的米轨铁路客车 ( 上 )

sentences.en: The Overseas Chinese youth in Burma organized a wartime work team.
sentences.cn: 缅甸华侨青年组织战时工作队.

sentences.en: Their trade in Burma was managed from Pulicat.
sentences.cn: 他们在缅甸的贸易受到普利卡特的支配.

sentences.en: This success enabled him to claim the allegiance of central Burma.
sentences.cn: 这一胜利使他得以要求缅甸中部归顺于他.

sentences.en: We of course wanted to recapture Burma.
